# rolling

## Headlands Dark Sky Park

:::: {.columns}

::: {.column width="47.5%"}

**Orange & Brown trails**  
Mackinaw City, MI  
~ 3 miles (but it felt like so much longer!)  
July 13, 2024  

<div style="text-align: justify">

This hike had it all! The orange trail was extremely accessible with wonderful views. It lulled us into a false sense of what the brown trail would hold for us. What was a well manicured, wide and mostly flat trail at the beginning quickly turned into a narrow, rooted, up and down winding trail that was impossible for the wheelchair at times.

</div>
